trans-unit.source: Pelican version 4.5 or above is required.
trans-unit.target: Pelican version 4.5 or above is required.

trans-unit.source: Typogrify version 2.0.7 or higher is needed for Typogrify to behave properly with this plugin. If this version is not available, Typogrify will be disabled for the entire site.
trans-unit.target: Typogrify version 2.0.7 or higher is needed for Typogrify to behave properly with this plugin. If this version is not available, Typogrify will be disabled for the entire site.

trans-unit.source: BeautifulSoup 4+ is required to correct summaries. If BeautifulSoup is not installed, summary processing will be ignored, even if specified in user settings.
trans-unit.target: BeautifulSoup 4+ is required to correct summaries. If BeautifulSoup is not installed, summary processing will be ignored, even if specified in user settings.

trans-unit.source: MathJax_font: [string] will force MathJax to use the chosen font. Current choices for the font is sanserif, typewriter or fraktur. If this is not set, it will use the default font settings. Default Value: default
trans-unit.target: MathJax_font : [string] will force MathJax to use the chosen font. Current choices for the font is sanserif , typewriter or fraktur . If this is not set, it will use the default font settings. Default Value: default

trans-unit.source: align: [string] controls how displayed math will be aligned. Can be set to either 'left', 'right' or 'center'. Default Value: 'center'.
trans-unit.target: align : [string] controls how displayed math will be aligned. Can be set to either 'left' , 'right' or 'center' . Default Value: 'center' .

trans-unit.source: auto_insert: [boolean] will insert the MathJax script into content that it is detected to have math in it. Setting it to false is not recommended. Default Value: True
trans-unit.target: auto_insert : [boolean] will insert the MathJax script into content that it is detected to have math in it. Setting it to false is not recommended. Default Value: True

trans-unit.source: color: [string] controls the color of the MathJax rendered font. Default Value: 'inherit'
trans-unit.target: color : [string] controls the color of the MathJax rendered font. Default Value: 'inherit'

trans-unit.source: indent: [string] if align not set to 'center', then this controls the indent level. Default Value: '0em'.
trans-unit.target: indent : [string] if align not set to 'center' , then this controls the indent level. Default Value: '0em' .

trans-unit.source: latex_preview: [string] controls the preview message users are shown while MathJax is rendering LaTex. If set to 'Tex', then the TeX code is used as the preview (which will be visible until it is processed by MathJax). Default Value: 'Tex'
trans-unit.target: latex_preview : [string] controls the preview message users are shown while MathJax is rendering LaTex. If set to 'Tex' , then the TeX code is used as the preview (which will be visible until it is processed by MathJax). Default Value: 'Tex'

trans-unit.source: linebreak_automatic: [boolean] If set, MathJax will try to intelligently break up displayed math (Note: It will not work for inline math). This is very useful for a responsive site. It is turned off by default due to it potentially being CPU expensive. Default Value: False
trans-unit.target: linebreak_automatic : [boolean] If set, MathJax will try to intelligently break up displayed math (Note: It will not work for inline math). This is very useful for a responsive site. It is turned off by default due to it potentially being CPU expensive. Default Value: False

trans-unit.source: message_style: [string] This value controls the verbosity of the messages in the lower left-hand corner. Set it to None to eliminate all messages. Default Value: normal
trans-unit.target: message_style : [string] This value controls the verbosity of the messages in the lower left-hand corner. Set it to None to eliminate all messages. Default Value: normal

trans-unit.source: process_escapes: [boolean] controls whether MathJax processes escape sequences. Default Value: True
trans-unit.target: process_escapes : [boolean] controls whether MathJax processes escape sequences. Default Value: True

trans-unit.source: process_summary: [boolean] ensures math will render in summaries and fixes math in that were cut off. Requires BeautifulSoup be installed. Default Value: True
trans-unit.target: process_summary : [boolean] ensures math will render in summaries and fixes math in that were cut off. Requires BeautifulSoup be installed. Default Value: True

trans-unit.source: responsive: [boolean] tries to make displayed math render responsively. It does by determining if the width is less than responsive_break (see below) and if so, sets align to left, indent to 0em and linebreak_automatic to True. Default Value: False (defaults to False for backward compatibility)
trans-unit.target: responsive : [boolean] tries to make displayed math render responsively. It does by determining if the width is less than responsive_break (see below) and if so, sets align to left , indent to 0em and linebreak_automatic to True . Default Value: False (defaults to False for backward compatibility)

trans-unit.source: responsive_break: [integer] a number (in pixels) representing the width breakpoint that is used when setting responsive_align to True. Default Value: 768
trans-unit.target: responsive_break : [integer] a number (in pixels) representing the width breakpoint that is used when setting responsive_align to True . Default Value: 768

trans-unit.source: show_menu: [boolean] controls whether the MathJax contextual menu is shown. Default Value: True
trans-unit.target: show_menu : [boolean] controls whether the MathJax contextual menu is shown. Default Value: True

trans-unit.source: tex_extensions: [list] a list of latex extensions accepted by MathJax. Default Value: [] (empty list)
trans-unit.target: tex_extensions : [list] a list of latex extensions accepted by MathJax. Default Value: [] (empty list)

trans-unit.source: Relevant inline math: $e=mc^2$
trans-unit.target: Relevant inline math: $e=mc^2$

trans-unit.source: Will not render as inline math: $40 vs $50
trans-unit.target: Will not render as inline math: $40 vs $50

trans-unit.source: BeautifulSoup
trans-unit.target: ビューティフルスープ

trans-unit.source: Both Markdown and reStructuredText are supported.
trans-unit.target: MarkdownとreStructuredTextの両方に対応しています。

trans-unit.source: Certain MathJax rendering options can be set. These options are in a dictionary variable called MATH_JAX in the Pelican settings file.
trans-unit.target: Certain MathJax rendering options can be set. These options are in a dictionary variable called MATH_JAX in the Pelican settings file.

trans-unit.source: Contributing
trans-unit.target: 貢献

trans-unit.source: Contributions are welcome and much appreciated. Every little bit helps. You can contribute by improving the documentation, adding missing features, and fixing bugs. You can also help out by reviewing and commenting on existing issues.
trans-unit.target: Contributions are welcome and much appreciated. Every little bit helps. You can contribute by improving the documentation, adding missing features, and fixing bugs. You can also help out by reviewing and commenting on existing issues.

trans-unit.source: Displayed Math
trans-unit.target: 表示された数学

trans-unit.source: Displayed math uses the math block:
trans-unit.target: Displayed math uses the math block:

trans-unit.source: However, if you wish, you can set the auto_insert setting to False which will disable the MathJax script from being automatically inserted into the content. You would only want to do this if you have control over the template and want to insert the script manually.
trans-unit.target: However, if you wish, you can set the auto_insert setting to False which will disable the MathJax script from being automatically inserted into the content. You would only want to do this if you have control over the template and want to insert the script manually.

trans-unit.source: If there is math detected in reStructuredText content, the plugin will automatically set the math_output configuration setting to mathjax.
trans-unit.target: If there is math detected in reStructuredText content, the plugin will automatically set the math_output configuration setting to mathjax .

trans-unit.source: In the past, using Typogrify would alter math content, resulting in math that could not be rendered by MathJax. The only option was to ensure that Typogrify was disabled in the settings.
trans-unit.target: In the past, using Typogrify would alter math content, resulting in math that could not be rendered by MathJax. The only option was to ensure that Typogrify was disabled in the settings.

trans-unit.source: Inline Math
trans-unit.target: インライン数学

trans-unit.source: Inline math is wrapped in span tags, while displayed math is wrapped in div tags. These tags will have a class attribute that is set to math which can be used by template designers to alter the display of the math.
trans-unit.target: Inline math is wrapped in span tags, while displayed math is wrapped in div tags. These tags will have a class attribute that is set to math which can be used by template designers to alter the display of the math.

trans-unit.source: Inline math needs to use the math role:

trans-unit.target: マークダウン

trans-unit.source: Math between $$..$$ will be rendered "block style", for example, $$x^2$$, will be rendered centered in a new paragraph.
trans-unit.target: Math between $$ .. $$ will be rendered "block style", for example, $$ x^2 $$ , will be rendered centered in a new paragraph.

trans-unit.source: Math between $..$, for example, $x^2$, will be rendered inline with respect to the current HTML block. Note: To use inline math, there must not be any whitespace before the ending $. So for example:
trans-unit.target: Math between $ .. $ , for example, $ x^2 $ , will be rendered inline with respect to the current HTML block. Note: To use inline math, there must not be any whitespace before the ending $ . So for example:

trans-unit.source: No template alteration is needed for this plugin to work. Just install the plugin and start writing your math.
trans-unit.target: このプラグインが動作するようにテンプレートを変更する必要はありません。プラグインをインストールして数学を書き始めるだけです。

trans-unit.source: Other Latex Display Math Commands
trans-unit.target: その他のラテックスディスプレイの数学コマンド

trans-unit.source: Pelican creates summaries by truncating the post content to a specified user length. The truncation process is oblivious to any math and can therefore destroy the math output in the summary.
trans-unit.target: Pelicanは、投稿内容をユーザーが指定した長さに切り詰めることでサマリーを作成します。この切り捨て処理は数学を意識しないので、要約の数学出力を破棄することができます。

trans-unit.target: PelicanのRender Mathプラグイン

trans-unit.source: Render mathematics in Pelican site content
trans-unit.target: ペリカンサイトのコンテンツで数学をレンダリングする

trans-unit.source: The dictionary can be set with the following keys:
trans-unit.target: 辞書は以下のキーで設定できます。

trans-unit.source: The other LaTeX commands which usually invoke display math mode from text mode are supported, and are automatically treated like $$-style displayed math in that they are rendered "block" style on their own lines. For example, \begin{equation} x^2 \end{equation}, will be rendered in its own block with a right justified equation number at the top of the block. This equation number can be referenced in the document. To do this, use a label inside of the equation format and then refer to that label using ref. For example: \begin{equation}\label{eq} X^2 \end{equation}. Now refer to that equation number by $\ref{eq}$.
trans-unit.target: The other LaTeX commands which usually invoke display math mode from text mode are supported, and are automatically treated like $$ -style displayed math in that they are rendered "block" style on their own lines. For example, \begin{equation} x^2 \end{equation} , will be rendered in its own block with a right justified equation number at the top of the block. This equation number can be referenced in the document. To do this, use a label inside of the equation format and then refer to that label using ref . For example: \begin{equation} \label{eq} X^2 \end{equation} . Now refer to that equation number by $ \ref{eq} $ .

trans-unit.source: The plugin also makes Typogrify and recognized math play nicely together by ensuring Typogrify does not alter math content.
trans-unit.target: The plugin also makes Typogrify and recognized math play nicely together by ensuring Typogrify does not alter math content.

trans-unit.source: The problem has been rectified in this plugin, but it requires at a minimum Typogrify version 2.0.7 or higher. If this version is not present, the plugin will disable Typogrify for the entire site.
trans-unit.target: The problem has been rectified in this plugin, but it requires at a minimum Typogrify version 2.0.7 or higher. If this version is not present, the plugin will disable Typogrify for the entire site.

trans-unit.source: This plugin can be installed via:
trans-unit.target: このプラグインは、経由してインストールすることができます。

trans-unit.source: This plugin gives Pelican the ability to render mathematics inside post content. It accomplishes this by using the MathJax JavaScript engine.
trans-unit.target: This plugin gives Pelican the ability to render mathematics inside post content. It accomplishes this by using the MathJax JavaScript engine.

trans-unit.source: This plugin implements a custom extension for Markdown resulting in math being a "first class citizen" for Pelican.
trans-unit.target: このプラグインはMarkdownのカスタム拡張機能を実装しています。

trans-unit.source: To restore math, BeautifulSoup is used. If it is not installed, no summary processing will happen.
trans-unit.target: To restore math, BeautifulSoup is used. If it is not installed, no summary processing will happen.

trans-unit.source: To start contributing to this plugin, review the Contributing to Pelican documentation, beginning with the Contributing Code section.
trans-unit.target: To start contributing to this plugin, review the Contributing to Pelican documentation, beginning with the Contributing Code section.
